title: Safety oriented first aid. Unit 3
brief_description: One of a series of instructional first aid films. Head, neck and back injuries - their examination and treatment, and moving the victim if necessary. The causes of burns and scalds, and first aid procedures. First aid for eye injuries, handling and moving casualties, and first aid for victims of poisoning. Narrated by John Granik.
